author: Subhajit Ganguly

resources.description: The dataset provides details of air quality with respect to Suspended Particulate Matter under National Air Quality Monitoring Programme (NAMP) in the year 2010. In the dataset a detailed summary of city-wise Suspended Particulate Matter levels in the country has been furnished. The data provided is an annual average concentration and number of observations with 16 and more hours of monitoring in a day. In addition to above the spread of the data has been given in terms of standard deviation. The ambient air quality monitoring network comprises of 456 stations in 31 States and Union Territories. The data is sourced from National ambient air quality status and trends in India - 2010.
resources.name: Air Quality with respect to Suspended Particulate Matter under National Air Quality Monitoring Programme (NAMP)in the year 2010

organization.description:
India specific data
For visualizations, please visit: http://in.okfn.org/visualized-data/
organization.title: India Data
organization.name: india
